  • Method Details

    • readFile_IO

      public static byte[] readFile_IO​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException, FileSizeOverflowException
      Reads file from given File object. This method uses "old" java.io style, where the source is coming from InputStream and OutputStream, more specifically FileInputStream. A buffer (byte[] array is used to buffer file contents from InputStream This method closes all streams
      Parameters:
      file - - File object that is the file to be read
      Returns:
      - byte[] array buffer
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - IO operation error
      FileSizeOverflowException - - If file length is very long

    • readFile_NIO

      public static byte[] readFile_NIO​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      Reads file from given File object. This method uses "new" java.nio style, where the source is coming from Channel more specifically FileChannel. A buffer (ByteBuffer is used to buffer file contents from FileChannel This method closes all channels and returns ByteBuffer as byte[] array
      Parameters:
      file - - File object that is the file to be read
      Returns:
      - byte[] array buffer (from ByteBuffer)
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - IO operation error

    • readFile_NIO_DIRECT

      public static byte[] readFile_NIO_DIRECT​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      This method uses a direct approach and uses the "new" style, java.nio.
      Parameters:
      file - - File to be read
      Returns:
      - byte[] array, buffer
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - IO operation error

    • read_NIO_MAP

      public static java.nio.MappedByteBuffer read_NIO_MAP​(java.io.File file) throws java.io.IOException
      A "fast" approach to read from a File with MappedByteBuffer However, in my experiments, this resulted in the slowest performance, whereas readFile_IO(File) was the fastest
      Parameters:
      file - - File to be read
      Returns:
      - MappedByteBuffer object
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - - IO operation error

    • enumStatusToString

      public static java.lang.String enumStatusToString​(java.lang.String status)
      Utility function to convert HTTP status to Status instance
      Parameters:
      status - HTTP Status
      Returns:
      Status name

    • isDirectory

      public static boolean isDirectory​(java.lang.String dirPath)
      Utility function to check if a file is a directory
      Parameters:
      dirPath - directory path
      Returns:
      true/false

    • removeLastChars

      public static java.lang.String removeLastChars​(java.lang.String str, int chars)
      Utility function to remove last character of a string
      Parameters:
      str - string
      chars - how many chars will be removed
      Returns:
      # of chars removed from original string

    • debug

      public static void debug​(boolean debugEnabled, java.lang.String message, org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger)
      Debug utility for debugging mode configuration
      Parameters:
      debugEnabled - debug configuration (true / false)
      message - debug statement
      logger - Logger instance
